Title: S5 Ep. 199 Jaime Donally
Description:
Jaime Donally is an expert in VR and AR in the education industry.  She LOVES technology in the classroom and how it can reshape learning for students.  As a published author, sought after speaker, and SME in the use of virtual and augmented reality she will keep you engaged and wanting to learn more.  Connect with her on LinkedIn or read her book, The Immersive Classroom.  

The Intern Whisperer is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Improving #Skills based diversity #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike.
